segments.text: I'm watching this scene, and I can't quite believe it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can an adult be so completely oblivious to her surroundings?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is clearly overflowing, yet she just keeps polishing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her apron and dress will be soaked if she's not careful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the children! They are practically inviting disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That boy is going to fall, I just know it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What irresponsible behavior to allow such a rickety stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's quite disgusting to see such a mess developing unchecked.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This entire household seems to be in a state of neglect.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to pay more attention to what's happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's frankly a rather poor display of household management.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I shake my head at the sheer lack of awareness.
segments.speaker: PAR
